mapper.insert: insert into message(member_id, message_room_id, content, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{memberId}, #{messageRoomId}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedAt}, #{updatedBy});
mapper.select: select id, member_id, message_room_id, content, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by from message where id = #{id}
